title: Family Systems Healing
description: Understand your role in family dynamics and free yourself from inherited patterns while maintaining connection.
curriculum: Understanding family systems theory and dynamics
Identifying your role and function in the family
Changing your part in repetitive family dynamics
Building healthy relationships with family of origin
outcomes: Understand how family systems work and why patterns persist
Identify your specific role and how it shaped you
Change your part in dysfunctional dynamics
Create more conscious relationships with family

modules.title: Understanding Family Systems
modules.description: How families function as interconnected systems

modules.title: Intergenerational Patterns
modules.description: What gets passed down and why

modules.title: Changing Your Part
modules.description: Breaking patterns by changing your moves

requirements: Willingness to examine family dynamics honestly
Openness to seeing your own role in dynamics

questions.question: What is the main insight of family systems theory?
options: Individuals should be understood in isolation
Family members function as interconnected parts of a system
All family problems come from parents
Cutting off from family is the best solution

questions.question: What is differentiation?
options: Completely separating from your family
Agreeing with everything your family believes
Being a self while staying connected to others
Making yourself different to stand out

questions.question: Why do family patterns tend to repeat across generations?
options: Genetics alone determines behavior
Unprocessed material gets unconsciously transmitted
Children consciously choose to repeat patterns
There is no evidence that patterns repeat

questions.question: What is a triangle in family systems?
options: A healthy three-person relationship
A way to reduce anxiety by involving a third party
A geometric arrangement of furniture
A type of family meeting

questions.question: How does changing your part affect family dynamics?
options: It has no effect on others
It forces others to also change immediately
It shifts the entire system because all parts are connected
It only affects you, not the system

subtitle: Understand your family, free yourself
